a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Historical trends across infectious diseases, World
The number of cases of a range of infectious diseases. Estimated cases are shown for paralytic polio, HIV/AIDS,
malaria and tuberculosis, while reported cases are shown for cholera, guinea worm, smallpox and yaws.
Data source: World Health Organization - Global Health Observatory (2024) and other sources
Note: Reported case numbers are limited by surveillance capacity.
